actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 94-669.

official_title: A resolution continuing and authorizing additional expenditures by the Select Committee on Nutrition and Human Needs.

summary.text: Extends the Senate Select Committee on Nutrition and Human Needs through February 28, 1977. Authorizes the expenditure of $439,000 for expenses involved in studying matters pertaining to the lack of food, medical assistance, and other necessities of life and health. Provides that the expenses of the committee shall be paid from the contingent fund of the Senate.

titles.title: A resolution continuing and authorizing additional expenditures by the Select Committee on Nutrition and Human Needs.
